SEARCH
Package oop.controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
oop.controller.AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
The AppointmentController class manages all operations related to appointments, including scheduling, rescheduling, cancellation, and viewing appointment details. It interacts with Excel files to persist appointment data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppointmentController()
    Constructs an AppointmentController and initializes the appointment number based on the last appointment ID found in the Excel file.

      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Schedules an appointment for a patient by allowing them to choose from available slots.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient who is scheduling the appointment
      doctors - a list of available Doctors
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing Excel files
